name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-js-demo-time
title: Demo Time
shortDescription: This web part is more a POC created for the SharePoint Hackathon 2025. This web part allows you to quickly add presentation mode to any page on your site. It has no UI and is not visible after publish, so not edit mode of the page. After adding it to a page and publishing it will add an additional Play in the page header.
longDescription: This web part is more a POC created for the SharePoint Hackathon 2025. This web part allows you to quickly add presentation mode to any page on your site. It has no UI and is not visible after publish, so not edit mode of the page. After adding it to a page and publishing it will add an additional Play in the page header.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
